CustomField.description: The Region Director for the Store Region Name that has been selected. This field is populated through a formula. Field Type: Store Data Integrated: N - This field is populated through a formula.
CustomField.formula: CASE(Store_Region_Name__c,"West","Jeff Roberts","Central","Pat Hostetter","East","Peter Troy","Heartland","Jason Pfau","South","Andy Thompson","The Gulf","Greg Guillot","")

This is the Region Director Name for the Region Name selected.
